reviewText:
The high DVD production quality was only surpased by Ms Evancho's
performance. I hope she does more concerts on DVD.

This little 11 year old lady is absoutely amazing.  I first saw her on the PBS special at Ringling Brothers in Sarasota, Florida.  What can you say about this wonderful little beauty?  You want to hug her and never let her go.  I wish I could be her body guard.  The DVD and CD that I purchased from Amazon is truly something everyone should own.  I will cherish these two items forever.
